original_title: Верую, или Филистерский мир политических животных
overview: The action explores the surrealistic absurdist ritual called “Elections of the President of the Republic of Belarus”. This procedure, in my understanding, is a ceremony of an eccentric farce, with the intersection of modern form of religious worship and hierarchical animal behavior of primates.
title: I Believe, or The Philistine World of Political Animals
